reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_text: I received this #freeproduct thanks to @influenster and @MontBlanc. #MontBlancLegend smells absolutely amazing. For me, the cedar and sandalwood really pop with the citrus spice from the bergamot. The only downside I see is longevity of wear. Perhaps the spray covers larger area with larger bottles and expels more product but with 3 sample size sprays across the chest and 1 on each of the wrists it just didnu2019t last as long as we had liked. Would definitely buy a larger bottle!!

My Husband picked this out and loves it I love it too. It smells clean and just oh so manly! Not too strong not to light is what I think about this fragrance. Must get a sample.
Bought this for my hubby. One of my all time favs!
Bought this for my boyfriend and it's amazing

I'm a Fragrance Reviewer on Youtube and all I care about are Sexy Fragrances. This one definitely makes a good impact in beeing sexy. It is very similar to Abercrombie & Fitch Fierce but far Cheaper! See for yourself on how it rates in my Fragrance Top 10
I got this for my boyfriend and he always gets compliments! I love it.

reviews.review_title: Nice, reminds me of CK One a bit
reviews.review_text: This was in the sample bag I purchased for my husband. His 2 favorites were this and Prada Luna Rossa Sport. This one smells nice, but something about it threw me back to the 1990's CK One. Interesting.
Made for a boss, manly, modern, & fresh . Great for night & day. not to strong , just enough to draw you in . Try it out - it smells amazing .
Received a sample from Sephora and instantly my husband was addicted to this cologne! He received so many compliments. I ended up buying it for him for Christmas.
My boyfriend uses this cologne and I can never get enough of it whenever he wears it. I am always telling him that he smells so good.

I had been on the hunt for a unique scent for my bf that complimented his style and personality and this is him in a bottle. Every time he uses it everyone asks what it is and I'm like a monkey wrapped around him w my nose glued to his neck.

I came in with my best friends thinking I was going to buy Ralph's Polo Red just because my brother said it was good and it has great reviews but it really wasn't all that. After smelling most of what they had this is the one that was perfect! Nothing too crazy. It's a modern cologne that kind of has a familiar smell to it. You can't go wrong. Seriously. My girl friends and I LOVE this one. Better than the popular colognes people usually go for.
Bought for my husband. He really like the scent and so do I. Perfect for day or evening.

I bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas as a whim and absolutely fell in love with it as soon as I pulled it out of the box! I couldn't resist trying a sample on my BF before wrapping--and it smells simply divine!! He loves it too! :)

Honestly I think this is my new favorite men's fragrance. I bought my boyfriend YSL L'Homme a few months back and thought that was the best one out there. This one is just a whole other level! It smells incredible! Not too strong, not too musky or woody, not too sweet either. I can't describe it- it's the perfect blend of notes. I immediately bought a 3.3 size for my boyfriend because of the way it smells on him! I could be around this scent for hours. So in love!

reviews.review_title: hubby loves it and so do I!!!!
reviews.review_text: Loved it! Bought for my husband for our anniversary and he was very pleased with it!!! Very clean scent
Bought it for my boyfriend. He loves it. My favorite scent on men!
Bought it for my partner as a gift he loves it just as much as I do.
Sprayed this on my man and got hot Mmmmmm

I LOVE it!!!! I feel like being cuddled in his arms whenever I smell it! I feel all warm and fuzzy when it's freezing cold out and I feel like falling asleep in his arms while I'm standing. IT'S A MUST HAVE!!! Plus all the ladies like a good smelling guy, don't they?

Now, I don't particularly like when men wear fragrances. This this right here?! It's the equivalent of gold and diamonds in a bottle. My boyfriend had been complaining that he couldn't ever find a cologne that worked for him. Until I swooped in (having worked at Sephora) and got him a bottle of this bad babe. OH MY GOD! UNF! Now my man does not mind my weirdness, and lets me sniff him every time he wears this. Needless to say, I've repurchased this for him numerous times. The most recent bottle he left at the gym when he was coming to meet me out for dinner and threw the biggest fit, he was so upset. thankfully I had already picked up his anniversary give being a box set of the cologne, after shave, body spray and deodorant. He was so siked, so happy. best anniversary gift yet!
Mont Blanc Legend...This Cologne gives me orgasms every time I smell it.. This is what a real man smells like... I've giving this to a couple of my past boyfriends and present lovers.
Bought this cologne for my boyfriend and I absolutely love it and so does he!
Bought this for my husband because it smells soooo good...you will not be disappointed! I'm obsessed!!!
BEST FATHERS DAY GIFT EVER!!!! this smells amazing and this lucky person would be crazy not to love it! :-)

This cologne is a win for my husband. I feel like soapy smelling and almost girly colognes are taking over the market. This is just the perfect combination of clean and masculine for him. I would definitely recommend. It lasts all day on my husband!
My boyfriend bought this today and we absolutely love it! He put some on about 6 hours ago and the scent is still strong. Would recommend to guys looking for a long last smell good scent.

I bought this for my brother as a Christmas present after smelling it on a friend of mine and becoming obsessed with it. The scent lasts for so long. Everytime I drive my brothers car I can smell it on the seatbelt and I can't get enough!
I have purchased this cologne almost 20 times, even tough I like other options I always come back to Mont Blanc because The Scent last sooooo long !!!

Bought this fragrance for my boyfriend on Valentines Day and I love how this scent makes my boyfriend smell. He typically like the woodsy tones where I happen to like the fresher scents. This is a nice mix of the two, though it's not overwhelming. I also think this scent is great for all seasons throughout the year. I recommend you give this a try!
I bought this as a v-day gift for my husband, and he likes it. I like that the scent lingers on after he leaves a room.
smells great and lasts all day. Bottle is sturdy, good for travelling
sexy , long lasting and classy

I bought this for my boyfriends birthday after trying literally ever other mens scent in Sephora. It was a bonus that it was a fraction of the cost of other scents.  I actually make him keep the bottle at my house so I can make sure he smells this good all the time. When we have a few days in between seeing each other I will sometimes spray my scarf and it smells so warm, sexy and fantastic.  Worth every penny and I will repurchase for him when he(we) run out

I actually work the fragrance wall at Sephora and after initially testing it for a client I fell in love, I decided that I HAD to get it for my boyfriend. My boyfriend, however, wasn't a fragrance wearer so I decided to have him smell it and try it out and he fell in love with it too. He constantly gets compliments when he wears it and I of course am very happy.
I bought this Eau de Toilette for my boyfriend during christmas and not only does he love it but i do as well. It smells very manly and lasts for a while!!

Bought this for my husband after we tried almost every fragrance in the store, and it was the hands-down winner. Some of the other fragrances were too prominent in one scent, not manly enough, or just plain weird. This one is musky yet still bright, well-balanced and smoldering all the way through. Sometimes I worry about sending him to work wearing this, but it was honestly the best gift I could have gotten him/us!
Bought this for my man for Christmas and he's constantly getting complements when he wears it! Smells amazing and is so well priced.
My husband really likes Legend. It smells great on him, very masculine. I can still smell it on him at the end of the day.

I bought this fragrance for my husband for Christmas and he loved it! I thought it smelled good on its own, but when my husband put it on....let's just say he didn't need mistletoe! I'm buying the Legend Intense for Valentine's Day and I'm hoping for the same fireworks!

Bought this for my husband for Christmas and he loves it! My husband is 24 and I thought he would like a different cologne from this, but he smelled this and loved it. Hard to describe the smell, I think it smells like something a dad would wear....if that makes any sense. But he loves it so that's all that matters!
I absolutely love this. Smells amazing!
If you want girls all over you, buy this.
My bf just got this new cologne and I am obsessed it last such a long time, I mean for days without adding another spray and It smells so good
The very 1st day I wore my cologne I received a compliment from the receptionist, Wow you smell good, what are you wearing? Definitely a must have....

reviews.review_title: Never fed up of inhaling this perfume!
reviews.review_text: This is a very fresh and classy perfume for men. We cannot get enough of this smell. Good for all seasons and occasions.

I bought this as a birthday gift for my boyfriend. He had been wanting it for a while and I didn't have time to go to the mall to buy it for him. I wasn't too sure of the smell because it's very strong when first applied. However, as it wears off a bit, it smells amazing and (the less strong smell) lasts all day! Definitely a must-have for a guy who likes cologne.
my boyfriend was looking for a new smell. this one smells amazing! we both love it. lasts long, go for the larger bottle. must better value.

I am really picky about smelling like I just bathed in a bottle of Brut which I find a lot of mens' colognes to smell like. I almost prefer a masculine woman's perfume to a degree. This smells masculine and clean not over powering, a little goes a long way. I find it appeals to both men and women, I get asked at work what I am wearing a lot. I hope this helps out some guys that are unsure about what they like.
My husband chose this and I love it, especially for summer. It is pretty fresh and light, and smells really clean, which is great. It kind of smells like the A&F stores :-)
Bought it for my hubby, love the smell, not too strong or overbearing.
I absolutely love this cologne. Bought it for my father for his birthday and it's now all he wears! Not too strong, smells lovely, and long lasting. Def would recommend if and buy again.
I like this bc it lasts a while. Most colognes fade so quickly on me. The girlfriend approves!
So obsessed with this!!! Smells amazinggg...Was looking a for new cologne for a while and finally sniffed my way to this! I am not the best note describer so you should go sniff for yourself!

This is one of the best smelling colognes out there! I got it for my boyfriends birthday and he could not be happier with it, very manly and sensual smelling. I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a great new cologne!
My husband purchased this for his cousin but he liked the smell of it. I might have to get it for his birthday now. I love the smell myself
Out of all of the colognes I have, Montblanc is one of my top favorites. It has a great scent and women absolutely love it!!!! I would recommend this product to anyone interested in it.

A client was in my office wearing this and I got weak in the knees. My male colleague came in for a moment, then when the client left we both gushed about how good he smelled. It was so intoxicating that I (against my better judgement of appropriateness) emailed him two days later saying how good he smelled and asking him what he was wearing so I could buy it for my husband. I think I would be powerless to resist any suggestion from any man wearing this...and I do not generally like being able to smell a man's cologne...I find those guys with strong scents douchey - but they could BATHE in this and I wouldn't mind. <3
Can't get enough of this smell.

I was so nervous about getting a cologne for my fiance to wear because it always smells different on the person but I absolutely loved how it smelled on him! I bought it for Valentines Day and he was very pleased. I definitely recommend this!
I bought this for my husband for Christmas, it is hands down one of my favs!!!

reviews.review_title: A. W. E. S. O. M. E.
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing improvement from my boyfriend's past Marshall's fragrance purchase. #mouthwatering I can't keep my hands off of him!
L-O-V-E this cologne. My fav for hubby!
Bought this for my husband. It is the best men's fragrance I've ever come across!!! It has a leather scent - very manly!
This perfume has a great essence, its just the perfect combination, not so strong but you can feel it all day long.
I gave a sample to my boyfriend and he LOVED IT! He's getting the gift set for Christmas! Smells wonderful not too spicy or too clean - a nice balance

I bought this cologne after one of my other favorite colognes that smelled very similar to this was discontinued. I was ecstatic to come upon this after smelling/testing several colognes that smelled like my past favorite. This is now my signature 'go to' cologne that can be worn day or night. Definitely worth purchasing if you gravitate towards warm, woodsy scents that aren't too overpowering.

My husband requested this for Christmas which is odd because he very rarely wears cologne and doesn't tend to like most colognes he tests. This is a wonderful, classic scent that isn't musky or cloying. It's light, classic, and clean but not clinical smelling. Some people claim it seems very generic but I disagree. It's classic with a fresh masculine scent. It's not heavy but has good projection/sillage without being overwhelming. The longevity is good for a lighter masculine scent but it is harder to detect after five to six hours or so. And I see no problems with the cost as my perfume cost much more!
Smells ok, but very generic

Picked this out for my husband after smelling a dozen others. One whiff of this and I had to get it. It smells so sexy and manly. I love it on him. He's very picky about colognes and he loved it as well.
This product is fantastic and the 50ml is perfect for traveling.
It smells fantastic! I got it for my boyfriend's birthday and it's nothing too strong and it has this delicious musky scent.

I am fortunate enough to have a boyfriend who allows me to pick out his cologne. When searching for a new cologne for him I stumbled upon this gem and haven't bought anything else since. It's a masculine cologne that has the perfect snuggability factor. I find most cologne to be too overpowering to snuggle with, but Legend is perfect. I find it hard to keep my hands off him when he's wearing it!
This is nice but I liked it better in the bottle than on the hubby. That happens. But its nice. Probably go back to one of the Chanel for men fragrances.
My best perfume ever. Came across Montblanc in Paris while in transit. Could not take the scent out of my mind. Got it on my way back to the U.S. Got a lot of compliments for it. My number one.

I helped my boyfriend pick this scent. He is rather conservative and only wore aftershave previously. This has the clean scent he wanted without smelling like soap! It literally makes me weak and want him more than ever when I smell it on him. Scent lasts all day and not overpowering.

My mom asked me to purchase this for her, so she could give it to my dad for a Father's Day present. It smells absolutely incredible. I wish I found it first, so I could've given it to my husband (god knows dad & husband can't have the same scent- awkward!!). In my opinion, this is better than most D&G, Lacoste & Armani scents.
Smells exactly like Abercrombie cologne; which is fine, if you like that smell and like spending a lot of money to smell like a tween...
Bought this for my boyfriend and he LOVES it. Stays on him all day and has a nice but not-overpowering scent. Men - get this cologne you'll have women chasing you!

I work at a Sephora inside JCPenney and when this cologne arrived in store a few days ago we all went CRAZY over it. Two of us have already bought it for our men. It is my experience with these girls that we all have very different preferences when it comes to fragrances. Somehow we ALL LOVE THIS. I cannot describe. Men, pick this one! PLEASE!
Excellent scent! Was given a small bottle for my birthday in November and just ran out. Bought a 5 fl oz bottle today at the mall, 14 dollar difference then the 3.3 oz. and 100% worth it.
Very nice cologne. It's not to overpowering but yet u can smell for a long time. Has a sweet but still formal smell to it.
I got this for my husband for Christmas and what can I say I follow him around like a little lost puppy.. yummy!! Guys this is definetly a winner for ya
. Great sophistic man scent!
I bought this for my husband for Christmas and every time he wears it I can't keep away from him. Needless to say he loves it too. Lol

reviews.review_title: Why thank you, it IS nice.
reviews.review_text: Very wearable scent in the woods/spice style that I like. Gets noticed and would be quite polished on a man.
got this for my boyfriend for christmas he loves it!
Smells good and my fiance is obsessed with this cologne! But to me it smells too much like Abercrombie & Fitch Fierce.
So i am a girl and use this i know i know its weird but i love the abercrombie smell and this is a way to get a bigger bottle of it and it smells SOOOOO good!

This is the most delicious, manly scent I have ever smelled. My husband (who doesn't like to wear cologne) asked me to smell a sample from a magazine he was reading. I was hooked! I bought him a bottle, & we both love it. It is very rugged and masculine. If I had to compare it, I would say it sort of resembles a grown-up version of one of the Crush colognes. Needless to say, I will be a repeat customer.
This cologne is amazing. Perfect gift for that special guy. Every male should smell like this. It's definitely top five right net to Chanel bleu or ysl lhomme! Love love love
The best!! Very manly-man stuff! So sexy and even a little dark but in a good way!
if someone asked me what this smelled like the only true answer would be that it smells like heaven it's not too overpowering but not too subtle either, perfect balance for all day cologne.
